entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Forecast issued 10:24 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of light snow or rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 10:24 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:24 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
